Package VMF

Class VendingMachineFactory

java.lang.Object
VMF.VendingMachineFactory
public class VendingMachineFactory extends Object
The VendingMachineFactory class is responsible for creating and managing vending machines. It allows creating vending machines, disposing of vending machines, and retrieving all vending machines.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    VendingMachineFactory()
    Constructs a new VendingMachineFactory object.

  • Constructor Details

    • VendingMachineFactory

      public VendingMachineFactory()
      Constructs a new VendingMachineFactory object. Initializes the lists for vending machines and special FriedRiceVMs.

  • Method Details

    • createVendingMachine

      public VendingMachine createVendingMachine(String machineName, int numSlots, int slotCapacity)
      Creates a new vending machine by prompting the user for input.
      Parameters:
      machineName - the name of the vending machine
      numSlots - the number of slots in the vending machine
      slotCapacity - the maximum capacity of each slot
      Returns:
      the created vending machine

    • createSpecialVM

      public FriedRiceVM createSpecialVM(String machineName, int slotCap)
      Creates a new special FriedRiceVM vending machine.
      Parameters:
      machineName - the name of the special FriedRiceVM
      slotCap - the maximum capacity of each slot in the special FriedRiceVM
      Returns:
      the created special FriedRiceVM vending machine

    • getAllVendingMachines

      public List<VendingMachine> getAllVendingMachines()
      Returns a list of all vending machines created by the factory.
      Returns:
      the list of vending machines

    • getAllFriedRiceVMS

      public List<FriedRiceVM> getAllFriedRiceVMS()
      Returns a list of all special FriedRiceVM vending machines created by the factory.
      Returns:
      the list of special FriedRiceVM vending machines

    • disposeVendingMachine

      public void disposeVendingMachine(VendingMachine vendingMachine)
      Disposes of a vending machine by removing it from the factory's list of vending machines.
      Parameters:
      vendingMachine - the vending machine to dispose of
